data.contentText:
Estimate gestational age at birth to the nearest week using one of: 

A) Fundal height
B) Length of Pregnancy (LMP)
C) Ultrasound Scan
D) Maturity Score

Maturity score is the most accurate!
data.infoText:
#### **APPROXIMATE GESTATION = TOTAL SCORES A) TO F) + 20**

### ***A) Breast size***
#### <5mm (1) 5-10mm (2) 10mm (3)


### ***B) Skin Opacity***
#### Lots of veins and tributaries visible (1)
#### Some veins & tributaries visible (2)
#### Large blood vessels only (3) 
#### Few/no vessels visible (4)


### ***C) Scalp hair***
#### Fine (1) Coarse & silky (2)


### ***D) Ear Cartilage*** 
#### None (1) Antitragus only (2) Antihelix (3) Helix (4)


### ***E) Fingernails***
#### Don't reach fingertips (1) Reach fingertips (2) Pass fingertip (3)


### ***F) Plantar creases***
#### None (1)
#### Anterior transverse crease only (2)
#### Creases on 2/3 of sole (3)
#### Creases on whole of sole (4)

fields.label: Method of estimating gestation
fields.values:
FundHt,Fundal height
LMP,Length of pregnancy / Last Mestrual Period (LMP)
USS,USS 
MatSc,Maturity score

data.title: PATIENT INFORMATION
